name: lmsq
description: CLI for the Lemon Squeezy API â€” manage your store, subscriptions, orders, and more from the command line. AI-agent optimized output.

scripts.build:compile:all: bun build --compile bin/lmsq.ts --outfile dist/lmsq-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 bin/lmsq.ts --outfile dist/lmsq-darwin-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 bin/lmsq.ts --outfile dist/lmsq-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 bin/lmsq.ts --outfile dist/lmsq-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 bin/lmsq.ts --outfile dist/lmsq-windows-x64.exe
